subject: Playoff Games
Football
lead_paragraph: The Steelers beat the Ravens twice this season, by a total of 7 points, and the rematch figures to be a clinic in the power of defense and the merits of controlled, if unspectacular, offense.
snippet: The Steelers beat the Ravens twice this season, by a total of 7 points, and the rematch figures to be a clinic in the power of defense and the merits of controlled, if unspectacular, offense.
